thread.title: JOHN MAYSE
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by JOHN MAYSE

author: JOHN MAYSE
title: JOHN MAYSE
text: BOUGHT A REFRIGERATOR AT THE STORE WAS TO BE DELIVERED TODAY. WAS NOT DELIVERED TODAY AND I WAS TOLD IT WILL BE ANOUGHTER TWO WEEKS. I CALLED THE STORE AND TOLD THEM MY PROBLEM AND I WAS PLACED ON HOLD AND AFTER TEN MINUETES I JUST HUNG UP. THEY ARE VERY EXCITED TO SELL YOU STUFF BUT AFTER THE SALES SERVICE IS TERRIBLE.
